login_failed_id_0001.scenario_name: Login service failed with invalid username
login_failed_id_0001.description: [Login Page]-[Given:User Login service failed with invalid username'., When: Users follow these steps {1. Input 'Username/Password', 2.  Click 'Login' button}, Then: Should be login failed]

login_failed_id_0002.description: [Login Page]-[Given:User Login service failed with invalid password'., When: Users follow these steps {1. Input 'Username/Password', 2.  Click 'Login' button}, Then: Should be login failed]
